results.title: Simvastatin induces impairment in skeletal muscle while heart is protected.
results.text_hl: The @<m>DISEASE_Mitochondrial_complex_I_deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C537475 @@@impairment of complex I@@@ by @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ might be the primary step of its cellular deleterious effects leading to @DISEASE_Continuous_Muscle_Fiber_Activity_Hereditary @DISEASE_MESH:C563545 @@@muscle fiber@@@ death.

citations.NLM: Sirvent P, Bordenave S, Vermaelen M, Roels B, Vassort G, Mercier J, Raynaud E, Lacampagne A. Simvastatin induces impairment in skeletal muscle while heart is protected. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2005 Dec 23;338(3):1426-34. PMID: 16271704
